nodes.text: Erin Rose Wage (born February 15, 1984) is the writer of Look and Find: Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi as well as many more children's books featuring Star Wars, Marvel, Disney, and other licensed characters. Her Star Wars books feature adaptations of the saga with illustrations by Art Mawhinney, Brian Rood, and others, plus sound effects and voices from the films.

Erin earned Bachelor and Master of Arts degrees in English from DePaul University, and spent a brief stint studying archaeology in Athens, Greece. She lives in Chicago with her spouse, Robert, and their cats, Linda and Motorcycle.
